description: This Python script provides functions to convert thread JSON data into formatted content for social media platforms (Typefully and LinkedIn), and to schedule these threads via an API. It includes functions for content transformation, scheduling logic, and integration with external services like requests, dotenv, and pydantic models.

methods.name: json_to_typefully_content
methods.description: Converts a JSON thread into a formatted string suitable for Typefully, separating tweets with four newlines.

methods.name: json_to_linkedin_content
methods.description: Converts a JSON thread into a LinkedIn-compatible content string, appending URL if present.

methods.name: schedule_thread
methods.description: Sends a POST request to schedule a thread on Typefully with specified parameters.

methods.name: schedule
methods.description: Main function to schedule a thread from a Pydantic model, converting content based on post type and calculating schedule time.
